definitions.definition: Any natural object or living creature that serves as an emblem of a tribe , clan or family ; the representation of such an object or creature.
The clan whose kinship is defined in reference to such an object or creature.
An arbitrarily chosen object serving as a reminder to check whether one is awake or not, to aid in having lucid dreams .
A tall object resembling a totem pole .

main_definition: Any natural object or living creature that serves as an emblem of a tribe , clan or family ; the representation of such an object or creature.
